description: Calamint (Calamintha nepeta 'Montrose White') is a beautiful and vibrant plant species that offers a unique display of delicate white blooms from late summer through to autumn. Its highly fragrant form and foliage make it a great addition to any garden. Its elegant foliage emerges as a bright, lime-green colour in the spring - warm weather brings purplish tinting - which makes an attractive groundcover. It also has nectar-rich flowers that attract bees, butterflies and hummingbirds. Furthermore, this plant is very hardy and requires minimum maintenance, making it an excellent choice for challenging growing conditions.
